text: Rachel Marilyn Lloyd (n√©e Laird; January 3, 1929 - September 19, 2018) was an American businesswoman and politician. She served for ten terms as member of the United States House of Representatives serving from 1975 to 1995.Lloyd, Marilyn Laird biodata, Biographical Directory of the United States Congress. Lloyd died on September 19, 2018 in Chattanooga, Tennessee from complications of pneumonia at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Tennessee Category:United States representatives from Tennessee Category:Businesspeople from Tennessee Category:Businesspeople from Arkansas Category:Politicians from Arkansas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Fort Smith, Arkansas
title: Marilyn Lloyd
